output: The weather in Borsec, Romania, over the next five days will feature cold temperatures and varying cloud cover. Monday starts with light snow and mostly cloudy skies, transitioning to clearer conditions by the evening, with temperatures dropping to -4.14°C. Tuesday and Wednesday will see scattered and overcast clouds, with temperatures ranging from -10.55°C at night to -2.23°C during the day, and occasional light snow on Wednesday afternoon. Thursday brings clearer skies, especially in the afternoon, with daytime temperatures reaching -1.91°C, but colder conditions return by the evening. Friday will have a mix of clear skies and broken clouds, with temperatures as low as -11.21°C in the morning and a high of -3°C during the day. Winds remain generally light throughout the period, with speeds mostly below 3 m/s.

The weather in Aşağı Beğdeş, Turkey, over the next five days will feature a mix of clear skies, clouds, and occasional rain. Monday will start with overcast conditions but clear up during the day, with temperatures reaching a high of 17.94°C. Tuesday and Wednesday will see mostly clear to partly cloudy skies, with daytime highs around 16-17°C, though Wednesday morning will bring overcast skies and stronger winds. Rain is expected on Thursday morning, with light showers and overcast conditions persisting throughout the day, accompanied by cooler temperatures around 7-8°C. Friday will remain mostly cloudy, with temperatures peaking at 6.95°C and scattered clouds in the evening. Winds will generally be light to moderate, with occasional gusts later in the week.

The weather in Bagakay, Philippines, over the next five days will be predominantly cloudy with occasional rain. Monday will start with light rain early in the day, followed by scattered and overcast clouds, with temperatures ranging from 26.45°C to 32.7°C. Tuesday and Wednesday will see consistent overcast skies, with light rain expected during some periods, particularly on Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning, accompanied by temperatures peaking around 30.47°C. Thursday and Friday will continue the trend of overcast conditions, with light rain on Thursday morning and temperatures ranging from 24.6°C to 29.58°C. Winds will generally remain light throughout the week, with speeds mostly below 5 m/s.

The weather in Plouay, France, over the next five days will be predominantly cloudy, with occasional clear skies and light precipitation. Monday and Tuesday will see overcast conditions, with temperatures ranging from 4°C to 11°C and light winds increasing slightly by Tuesday evening. Wednesday will bring clearer skies, with fog and mist in the early hours giving way to sunny conditions during the day, and temperatures peaking at 9.45°C. Thursday will start clear but transition to broken and overcast clouds by the evening, with temperatures dropping to around 6°C. On Friday, overcast skies will persist, accompanied by light rain in the afternoon and evening, with temperatures falling to 2°C and wind speeds increasing slightly.

Santa Maria, Philippines, will experience predominantly overcast skies over the next five days, with occasional light to moderate rain. Monday and Tuesday will see intermittent rainfall, with the heaviest rain expected on Tuesday evening (5.2 mm). Temperatures will range from 24.47°C to 29.5°C, with the highest "feels-like" temperatures reaching 36.5°C on Tuesday morning. Winds will generally be light, varying in direction, with speeds mostly between 1 and 5 m/s. By Friday, cloud cover will decrease slightly, with a mix of broken and few clouds during the day.

The city of Sampiro in the Philippines will experience predominantly cloudy conditions over the next five days, with intermittent periods of light rain. Monday will see broken and scattered clouds with temperatures peaking at 31.3°C and light winds. Rain is expected to begin on Tuesday afternoon, continuing through the week, with the heaviest rainfall of 5 mm forecasted on Thursday afternoon. Winds will gradually strengthen, reaching speeds of up to 12.76 m/s by Friday. Temperatures will remain relatively stable, ranging from 24.49°C to 31.3°C, with a slight cooling trend toward the end of the week.

The weather in El Cazadero, Mexico, over the next five days will remain predominantly clear with no significant cloud cover. Daytime temperatures will range from around 21°C to 24°C, while nighttime temperatures will drop to as low as 7°C to 16°C. Winds will generally be light, varying in direction, with occasional gusts reaching up to 5.23 m/s on Friday. Atmospheric pressure will remain stable, fluctuating between 1012 hPa and 1020 hPa. Overall, the conditions suggest calm and dry weather throughout the period.
